title: AI, Autonomous Vehicles, and Race – Oh my! with Malcolm Gladwell
description:
How do self-driving cars change our psychology? On this episode, Neil deGrasse Tyson and comic co-host Chuck Nice philosophize about science’s role in society with prolific author Malcolm Gladwell.

NOTE: StarTalk+ Patrons can watch or listen to this entire episode commercial-free.

Thanks to our Patrons Tobias Malmborg, Andy Pattinson, Adam Lenda, Naomi Martin, Johan Fredrik Oldervik, and Scott Heflen for supporting us this week.

Photo Credit: Grendelkhan, CC BY-SA 4.0, via Wikimedia Commons
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
